item.title: CVE-2024-49306|2024-10-20T13:40:28.435Z -- wp-buy -- wp%20content%20copy%20protection%20%26%20no%20right%20click
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP-buy WP Content Copy Protection & No Right Click allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects WP Content Copy Protection & No Right Click: from n/a through 3.5.9.
